name: Animated Instrument, Quartet
movement: walking speed of 30 feet and a flying speed of 50 feet, providing good maneuverability.
description: A large construct that exudes an aura of musicality, resembling a quartet of animated instruments. It has average physical might but excels in Charisma, enhancing its musical abilities.
memorable: The ability to blend in with other musical instruments when motionless and its performances that can terrify, knock down, or disrupt enemies make it a unique opponent.
goals: To serve as an entertainer and formidable opponent in combat, following its programmed intent.
relations: Typically operates independently as a construct but can be found in situations with other musical constructs.
environment: Can be found in theaters, concert halls, or locations where music is played.
strengths: Immunities to poison and psychic damage, along with several conditions such as being blinded, charmed, or paralyzed.
weaknesses: Susceptible to antimagic fields, which incapacitate it.
attacks: Multiattack capability with melee bludgeoning damage and ranged thunder damage attacks.
most_powerful_ability: Musical Arrangement ability that plays three powerful songs to affect nearby hostile creatures.
senses: Blindsight up to 60 feet allows it to sense its surroundings without needing sight.
skills: Proficient in perception, allowing it to notice things more easily.
additional_information: Antimagic Susceptibility makes it vulnerable in magic-less zones.
Construct Nature negates the need for air, food, drink, or sleep.
Four-Part Harmony reduces its effectiveness when one of its instruments falls unconscious.
test_queries: constructs with special abilities in combat
